comment._content: Bozena Laglerova, born in Prague in 1888, died in Prague in 1941. Flew under the name of Lagler: www.earlyaviators.com/elangler.htm

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Josef Richter  Aero Club of America Pilot# 81 December 27,1911
Richter's first flights occurred at the Belmont Park Racetrack , New York in  (Schneider biplane)  May 1911.
During September 1911 Richter was at College Park , Maryland testing the Tarbox automatic stability device.
